Project.Title: IO
Project.Description: Internet of Things Toy that teaches kids to read through play.

Project.Title: Heartbeat Blanket
Project.Description: Internet of Things blanket that sends mom's heartbeat to baby anywhere in the world. Designed specifically for newborn trauma babies.

Project.Title: Wearable Board
Project.Description: A flexible board designed to be sewn into clothing.

Project.Title: Wearable Haptic Feedback
Project.Description: Haptic feedback as communication in clothing.
